overview: ER Ejercito and Sonny Parsons played the roles of OXO and Sigue-Sigue Gang Leaders respectively. Though incarcerated, both heads of the two infamous gangs in Bilibid Prison wonâ€™t stop at anything just to get rid of each other and would do everything even to the point of inciting a grand riot inside for the sake of supremacy.
title: OXO vs Sigue-Sigue
